content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5 y=40.5), boiler(position x=1.5 y=1.0) and offshore pump (position x=-7.5 y=25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=-16.5 y=26.5) 
-  Boiler (position x=1.5 y=1.0) 
-  Pipe group (fluid_system=558999, fluid=water position=x=-5.5 y=-8.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structure found.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item but having no items to insert
-  Make sure to check the inventory before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when using connect_entities but being unable to connect
-  Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when checking for pipe connections but no pipe is found
-  Check the positions of the offshore pump and the boiler to ensure they are connected by a pipe.
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a fluid source before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to power network
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure the steam engine has an input liquid before attempting to use it.
